title: Is it reportable to type "GG EZ" after winning?
body:
A guy argued that it isn't reportable to say this after winning
I'm just wondering if this is considered acceptable by the community or not

replies.body:
If you beat someone in a chess tournament and said to his face, "that was an easy win," would you consider that acceptable behavior?

Most people say "no, that is not acceptable behavior". It is the same in LoL; saying "ez" at the end is the same as the preceeding example, and therefore falls under "unsportsmanlike behavior".

I don't know why people think behind hidden behind the internet makes it ok to be rude to people.

{{champion:51}}
You can consider it as "unsportsmanlike" and that's all we can say
I think it is reportable under "Negative Attitude" or if there's one for unsportmanlike conduct that would be better.
it's considered negative behavior/bad sportsmanship so yeah it's reportable
It's reportable due to the large amount of hypersensitive people that play league of legends. GGizi.
Unsportsmanlike Conduct. Reportable but not likely to get punished for it.

Or more specifically: Reportable, but usually not enough on it's own to be punished for. 

Now, if someone A. spams it throughout the match(es), B. say it after having been toxic all game. or C. the player has recently served a punishment already, then it can be the proverbial final straw, and cause a punishment to be handed out.

it's reportable, but every report u make will decrease the weight ur later reports carry so personally i wouldnt recommend reporting anyone who is being slightly toxic and/or unsportsmanlike and only report those who actually deserve permabans
